sect3.title: Gtk Extension
sect3.para: The GTK ActionScript class follows the same API as Gtk2, even down to the same arguments to the same function names. This means you're actually programming GTK,you're just using ActionScript instead of python, perl, or C. This extension makes it possible to write Flash movies that use the Gtk2 widgets for user interface components.

listitem.para: Add an event handler to a widget.
Set the width of the window border.
Create a new button and give it the specified label.
Swap signals. Commonly used for delete event handling.
Add one widget to another as a child.
Display the widget on the screen.
Start the main GTK event loop. This function does not return.
